Plot: When the staff inside a renovated film studio finds a co-worker dead one morning, the pieces of a forty year puzzle add up to an angry ghost who has let the last person step inside her house. But will they ever get out alive?
Title: Ghost of Goodnight Lane
Writer: Amy Acosta (screenplay), Alin Bijan (screenplay), Alin Bijan
Actors: Billy Zane, Lacey Chabert, Matt Dallas, Danielle Harris
